name: gccs
description: Vanilla Node.js script to compile JS code/files using Google Closure Compiler Service (zero dependencies)

scripts.test: (echo '#!/bin/env node' && node gccs.js --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --formatting pretty_print -- gccs.js -) > gccs.es5.js && chmod +x gccs.es5.js && (echo '#!/bin/env node' && node gccs.es5.js -- gccs.es5.js -) > gccs.min.js && chmod +x gccs.min.js && ! diff -q gccs.es5.js gccs.min.js > /dev/null && echo success

author: Dumitru Uzun <contanct@duzun.me> (https://DUzun.Me)
